item.description:
Afterwork Mixer this Thursday February 8th at REVOLUTION ROCK BAR & LOUNGE !!

For young professionals alike in the heart of Boston's Financial District 6:15-9:30pm.

The Afterwork mixer returns this Thursday February 8th. This time we are taking the party to the new Revolution Rock Bar & Lounge, one of the premier venues to hit the Boston nightlife scene in recent months. This multi-level venue offers a bar, lounge, restaurant and multiple entertainment options. I 've heard great reviews about this venue, so what better way to come out and have a few cocktails with the group as we gear up for another festive weekend in the city!

Meeting Details: We will meet at the front bar first floor , please look for me upon entering, my picture is on the left hand side of the website under the Assistant Organizer section. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND coming early as possible, with winter time in Boston this place will fill up fast!!

Also my phone is 617-671-5310. Please make note prior to arriving. Look forward to seeing you all there!

Steven


Public Transportation:

Green Line to Govt Center
Red Line to South Station
Orange Line to State St/Downtown Crossing
Blue Line to State St/Govt Center/

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Revolution Revolution!!! Afterwork Mixer this Thursday!!
